full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
### F6160-230009B Autonomous Underwater Vehicle

#### Solicitation Overview

A request for proposals from qualified suppliers for the provision of an Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (AUV).

#### Description of Goods and Services

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans requires one (1) AUV with the option to purchase three (3) additional AUV's prior to March 31, 2027.

#### Background

The prior solicitation of offers (F6160-230009 dated January 17, 2024) with a closing date of February 8, 2024, has been cancelled and replaced by this current solicitation.

#### Terms and Conditions

*       Deadline for Proposal Submission: May 24, 2024 at 2:00 PM ET
*       Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Notice Information

*       Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19578423?extsite=MTk1Nzg0MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19578423?extsite=MTk1Nzg0MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
*       Contact Information:
    *       Contact Person: Martin, Lisa (PSPC/TPSGC)
    *       Email: <lisa.m.martin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
    *       Phone: Not available

#### Notice Documents

 None

#### Regions and Languages

*       This notice is related to a procurement that may be subject to multiple tendering and may be tendered in multiple languages.
*       Agencies and Companies may submit their tenders in one or both official languages (English/French) in response to this notice.

#### Tender Status

*       The current tender status is Expired.

#### Categories

*       Marine Craft Systems and Subassemblies 
*       This procurement falls under the category of Competitive Bidding.

#### Agreements

*       This tender is subject to the provisions of various trade agreements (Please refer to the Notice documents for the detailed list).

#### End User Entities

*       The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is the primary end-user entity for this procurement.  There are no regional areas of opportunity. - The solicitation is competitive, open, and will be open for bid submissions until May 24,
